Dear {!Contact.FirstName},
Thank you for choosing LegalZoom, the leading online legal document service. We are ready to prepare your provisional patent application. However, before we can file it, we will need a drawing of your invention. Please send either:
An electronic copy of your drawings (such as a .jpg, .gif, or .pdf file) by email to patents@legalzoom.com
OR
A paper copy of the drawings by fax (323-389-0539), or by mail to: LegalZoom - Attention Patents 101 North Brand Blvd. 11th Floor Glendale, CA 91203 Re: Order # |#|
Be sure to reference your order number.
If you would like us to prepare professional patent illustrations for you, please call us at 888.791.0227 Mon-Fri 5am to 7pm PT; Saturday 7am to 4pm PT. The cost is $399.00. If you have any questions, please feel free to call us.
Best regards,
The LegalZoom Patent Team
******** Drawing Specifications *********
Please make sure that your drawings have dark lines. Photographs are generally not acceptable.
If your invention is a device or apparatus: Please provide any views of the invention that you feel would be necessary and beneficial in order to understand it.
If your invention is a system, method or process: Please provide flowcharts or diagrams of the invention. Also include, in a step by step manner, each function with its name, as well as any functions that send the user to another part of the process, and at what point the method or process should stop.
If your invention is a chemical combination: Please provide a list of ingredients, including quantities and how to combine the ingredients. You may consider including a molecular structural diagram of the end product. If you are claiming the manner of making the compound, please include a flowchart or diagram of this process as well.
